extensionDescription.message: Add-on for selecting Unicode characters by variety of means and converting between various representations

Unicode_table_caption_title.message: Control + left-click when over a character to freeze or unfreeze the descriptions below

About_contributors.message: and translated by Karoly Fabricz (hu-HU), Edgard Magalhães (pt-BR), Mikael Hiort af Ornäs (sv-SE).

About_paypal.message: If you find this extension useful, please consider a {About_paypal_button}.

About_ial.message: The author of the extension wishes to invite you to consider (and promote) the idea of an official {About_ial_wikipedia_link}, so that the peoples of the world will one day all be able to inter-communicate due to early language instruction and spend their energies on more productive (as well as understanding-raising and cost-saving) areas than learning multiple lingua francas, freeing them up to do other things such as study whatever local or other language they may wish to learn: {About_ial_onetongue_link}
